root.name: Miami Vice
root.description: OverviewMiami Vice is a shooter developed by Rebellion and published by Vivendi Games (US release), Blizzard Entertainment (European releases), and Taito Corporation (Japanese release) for the Sony PSP platform.Based on the 2006 Michael Mann re-imagining of the classic 80's TV series. Play as Sonny Crockett or Ricardo Tubbs, two undercover cops looking to take down a big-time drug dealer.
